title: PowerVS subnets: inconsistency in state file:: pi_advertise and  pi_arp_broadcast
body:
With the new attributes supported now..
```
 pi_advertise         = "enable"
 pi_arp_broadcast     = "disable"
```

Case : When a **user is not specifying** these attributes, **the default value** in your backend **must be enable and disable respectively** and not the value  **null**. . If a user sp...

title: FIP is attempted to be deleted twice
body:
**Describe the bug**
We have 2 provisioners (shell, ansible) in a template and see the following behavior where FIP is attempted to be deleted 2 times in a row, with the second attempt failing (no surprise here).

```
